movie.title: All Good Things
movie.plot: A love story and murder mystery based on the most notorious unsolved murder case in New York history. The original screenplay uses newly discovered facts, court records and speculation as the foundation for a story of family, obsession, love and loss.

events.title: Kathleen McCormack, who Katie McCarthy is based on, goes missing
Susan Berman, who Deborah Lehrman is based on, is killed
